US.fact: Home to the world's largest economy and birthplace of the internet.

CA.fact: Has the world's longest coastline and is the second-largest country by total area.

MX.fact: Invented chocolate, chili peppers, and corn cultivation.

BR.fact: Contains 60% of the Amazon rainforest and is the world's 5th largest country.

AR.fact: Birthplace of tango and has won the FIFA World Cup 3 times.
